dt.doc: Datestamp of the item (format "CCYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ"). Requires a LITERAL "T" and "Z" like in ISO8601 at http://www.cl.cam.ac.uk/~mgk25/iso-time.html for example: "1984-09-01T14:21:31Z"

replace.doc: Don't replace post if given url has already been posted.

postAll.doc: Returns all posts. Please use sparingly. Call the update function to see if you need to fetch this at all.

start.doc: Start returning posts this many results into the set.

fromdt.doc: Filter for posts on this date or later.

todt.doc: Filter for posts on this date or earlier.

meta.doc: Include change detection signatures on each item in a 'meta' attribute. Clients wishing to maintain a synchronized local store of bookmarks should retain the value of this attribute - its value will change when any significant field of the bookmark changes.

postAllHashes.doc: Returns a change manifest of all posts. Call the update function to see if you need to fetch this at all.

postDates.doc: Returns a list of dates with the number of posts at each date.

postGet.doc: Returns one or more posts on a single day matching the arguments. If no date or url is given, most recent date will be used.

dt.doc: Filter by this date, defaults to the most recent date on which bookmarks were saved.

url.doc: Fetch a bookmark for this URL, regardless of date. Note: Be sure to URL-encode the argument value.

hashes.doc: Fetch multiple bookmarks by one or more URL MD5s regardless of date, separated by URL-encoded spaces (ie. '+').

meta.doc: Include change detection signatures on each item in a 'meta' attribute. Clients wishing to maintain a synchronized local store of bookmarks should retain the value of this attribute - its value will change when any significant field of the bookmark changes.

postRecent.doc: Returns a list of the most recent posts, filtered by argument. Maximum 100.

count.doc: Number of items to retrieve (Default:15, Maximum:100).

postSuggest.doc: Returns a list of popular tags, recommended tags and network tags for a user.

url.doc: URL for which you'd like suggestions.

postUpdate.doc: Returns the last update time for the user, as well as the number of new items in the user's inbox since it was last visited.

tagBundlesAll.doc: Retrieve all of a user's bundles.

tagBundlesSet.doc: Assign a set of tags to a single bundle, wipes away previous settings for bundle.

tagsGet.doc: Returns a list of tags and number of times used by a user.

tagsRename.doc: Rename an existing tag with a new tag name.
